headline: Netflix (NFLX): How the 10-for-1 Stock Split Shapes Its Valuation After Strong Growth and Market Buzz
summary: Netflix’s recent 10-for-1 stock split is making waves with investors and fans alike. By lowering the price per share, Netflix has broadened accessibility for retail investors and employees. This move is stirring curiosity across the market. See our latest analysis for Netflix. The stock’s 10-for-1 split is grabbing headlines, but there’s plenty more unfolding for Netflix. After a year of robust revenue growth and a thriving ad-supported segment, shares recently pulled back, down 14.9% for the...

headline: Paramount, Comcast and Netflix Submit Bids for Warner Bros. Discovery
summary: Paramount, Comcast and Netflix have submitted bids for Warner Bros. Discovery, owner of the storied Warner Bros. movie and television studio and HBO, according to people familiar with the matter.  The bids submitted are nonbinding, and additional rounds are expected, The Wall Street Journal previously reported.  Warner Discovery  has indicated it would like to have the process concluded by the end of the year.
